踢.definition: to kick; to play (e.g. soccer); (slang) butch (in a lesbian relationship)

踢皮球.definition: to kick a ball around; (fig.) to mutually shirk responsibility; to pass the buck

踢腿.definition: to kick; to do a kick (dancing, martial arts etc)

踢館.definition: to challenge an established martial arts school to a fight (to prove one's skills or gain reputation); (fig.) to prove oneself by competing against those already established in a particular field
